study_plan_entry.title: Publishing in Management, Technology et  Innovation

free_text.Learning outcomes: The course aims to improve the competence of doctoral students in the area of economics and management of technology and innovation to publish their work in leading academic journals. target journals to be analysed are leading journals in the area of strategy, management and applied economics of innovation. Besides the journal analysis we will discuss selected papers in management and innovation research. [br/]The course is conducted as a cooperation between EPFL, ETH and University of St Gall[br/]
free_text.Content: The course address the following questions:[br/] [li]how to set up research for academic journals?[br/] [li]how to structure an academic paper for publication in selected journals?[br/] [li]how to address editorial boards[br/] [li]how to cope with editorial recommendations[br/] [li]how to sert up a publication strategy?[br/]Students wil either present their own works or study and present "academic papers model" they have identified in the litterature.[br/] [br/]
